Re-Flooring

Covering it All

Whether you’ve had damage to your current floors or you’re just looking to change things up, we’re generally pretty adaptable to whatever you’re looking to do. We can work with hardwood floors, laminate, and even tile floors.

Plus, at Carrillo Home Improvement, we only work with the highest quality products out on the market. That way you know, whenever you’re working with us, you’re ONLY getting the best of the best with both service and re-flooring. That’s our promise to you.

Above and Beyond Remodeling

As previously mentioned, there’s so much more to what we do at Carrillo Home Improvement in Dover, New Jersey than just remodeling. We tend to go above and beyond it all. One way we accomplish this is through our re-flooring services.
